wikitext.*:
'''Ferny''' is a [[Mannish]] surname of [[Bree]]. One of the family's members was [[Bill Ferny]].<ref>{{FR|I9}}</ref>

==Etymology==
Ferny refers to the plant name "fern".<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}, p. 757</ref>

Fern and Ferny, Fernie are real-life English surnames.<ref name="Nomen"/>
